list.title: App.tsx
list.description: Main application component with routing setup

list.title: Button
list.description: A customizable button component with different variants and sizes

list.title: CarouselImage
list.description:
A carousel component that displays product images with animated transitions.
Features include:
- Next/Previous navigation buttons
- Smooth slide animations
- Responsive image display
- Keyboard navigation support

list.title: CartProvider
list.description: Provides cart state and setter to child components

list.title: DocumentationLazy
list.description:
Lazy loaded Documentation component
Only loaded when the /docs route is accessed

list.title: ImageFallback
list.description: Displays a placeholder with a message when an image is not available

list.title: Loading
list.description: Displays a loading message within the main layout. Can be customized with specific loading context.

list.title: Navbar
list.description: Main navigation bar with mobile menu toggle, logo, cart and user profile

list.title: ProductDescription
list.description: Renders the product header section with company name, product title and description

list.title: ProductPrice
list.description: Renders product price information including current price, discount, and original price

list.title: ProductQuantity
list.description: Renders a quantity selector with increase/decrease buttons and current quantity display

list.title: ProductTemplate
list.description: Renders the main product page layout including carousel, description, price, quantity selector and add to cart button

list.title: Sidebar
list.description: Mobile navigation sidebar with dark overlay and animated transitions

list.title: SlideVariants
list.description: Slide animation variants configuration
